definition: Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The vessel containing the solution is stoppered with a glass stopper and is allowed to stand for 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 将装溶液的容器用玻璃塞子塞好并静止10分钟。

sentences.english: The tap on the cask was dirty.
The mapper trapped in the gap tapped the tap wrapper with strap.
sentences.chinese: 陷在缝中的制图者用皮带轻击塞子套套。

sentences.english: Incubation bottles with ground-glass stoppers are utilized.
sentences.chinese: 使用带毛玻璃塞子的培养瓶。

sentences.english: That opening of the barrel must be bunged down at once.
sentences.chinese: 那个桶口必须立即用塞子塞住。

sentences.english: You can see on this picture there is a HSA stopper on the magnet.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到这张照片上有一个磁铁HSA的塞子。

sentences.english: It was full of golden potion and the cork was still tightly sealed with wax.
sentences.chinese: 满满一瓶金黄色的药水，塞子仍然用蜡封得死死的。

sentences.english: First let's stick the plug in the drain.
Keep container closed and drum bungs in place.
sentences.chinese: 保持容器密封，并塞紧塞子。

sentences.english: These containers often have human or animal-headed stoppers.
sentences.chinese: 这些容器凡是具有人或动物头形的塞子。

sentences.english: The whirlpool appears reliably whenever we pull the plug.
sentences.chinese: 不管我们在何时拔掉塞子，漩涡都会无一例外地出现。

sentences.english: Thepiston is essentially a cylindrical plugthatmoves up and down inthe cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 实质上活塞是一个在气缸中上下移动的圆筒状的塞子。

sentences.english: I pull out the stopper in the bathtub…
sentences.chinese: 我把浴缸的塞子拔起来。

sentences.english: The mapper trapped in the breach tapped the pat wrapper with strap.
sentences.chinese: 埳在缝中的制图者用皮带轻击塞子套。

sentences.english: Air leakage of a stopper will cause fire during distilling combustibles.
sentences.chinese: 蒸馏易燃物时塞子漏气引起火灾。

definition: to unscrew/to twist off (a lid)/to turn on (a faucet)/to switch on (by turning a knob)/to turn (a door handle)/to wrench apart
Guanzi or Guan Zhong 管仲 (-645 BC), famous politician of Qi 齊國|齐国 of Spring and Autumn period/Guanzi, classical book containing writings of Guan Zhong and his school
